com.joml.vector

Class Vector3f

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joml.vector.Vector3f

  • public class Vector3f
extends Object
    Vector3f Contains the definition of a Vector comprising 3 floats and associated transformations.
    Author:
    Richard Greenlees
